Description: Unbaked pottery shabti of Padiamenet with a lappet-wig and crossed arms in relief holding two hoes; the front of the leg section is inscribed with a column of black painted hieroglyphs, two fragments have become detached from the back of the foot section.
Condition: broken - two fragments detached from the foot
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
